segments.text: Yeah . Complete with nice of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many windows are there in the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mm , let me see . I think there are 2 in the bedroom , and 1 each in the living room and kitchen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s just what I want . I think I am ready to sign .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I call the landlord right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Before you send the lease , do you have any questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , does the renting include utilities ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It includes everything except cable TV , and telephone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It usually comes out about $ 40 a month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Also , are they allowing the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I am afraid the apartment isn ’ t permitted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Do you love pets ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , that ’ s out of question . I don ’ t have a problem with it . But , unfortunately , the building doesn ’ t allow it . It ’ s a building regulation .
segments.speaker: S1
